constraints.name: sum_constraint
constraints.description: 数组元素和为固定值（n个1和m个-1）

constraints.name: frequency_bound
constraints.description: 数组中1的频次为n，-1的频次为m
constraints.formal: count(1, a) = n, count(-1, a) = m

constraints.name: max_prefix_sum
constraints.description: 计算数组的最大前缀和，如果所有非空前缀和都小于0，则最大前缀和为0
constraints.formal: f(a) = max(0, max_{1 ≤ i ≤ l} (sum_{j=1}^{i} a_j))
